name: Armor Battalion: Infiltrator
description: War not just being fought at the front line, to achieve victory, we need field agents to complete special Ops: gather information, sabotage enemy infrastructures, assassinate valuable targets. "Armor Battalion: Infiltrator" is an action-adventure stealth game for mobiles. Set in the same universe as "Heavy Armor Battalion: Tank Wars", this time you play a field agent for the Federation. With your effort, our troops will have an easy time on the battlefield, don't let us down, agent.
